comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: I just checked through the website, and so many details about the project are missing. How is this a gasless Dex when the gas price is only paid back to the users in the native tokens. I think this is misleading, thanks you picked Matic blockchain on which the gas price is very low as compared to Ethereum, another selling point here is concentrated liquidity, which means you are forking Uniswap V3 whose license expires in a few days' time. There is nothing novel here and you need to stand out since exchange space is becoming very competitive

comments.author: Weezenhofnar
comments.body: How is this project connected to Digicom Finance?
